title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 326: Featuring Jimmy Howard + Caleb Pressley
description:
On Episode 326 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jimmy Howard and Caleb Pressley. Jimmy joined (37:42) to discuss his career in Detroit and the legendary guys he got to play with, why he chose UMaine, and what he is up to now. The boys open the show talking about the Tim Peel situation and all the recent trades that have happened. The fellas are then joined by Caleb Pressley (1:54:27) of Barstool Sports and the 51 Stroke Podcast. Caleb joined to discuss his now podcast, his role at barstool, and his path to becoming a pro golfer. The guys wrap up talking some movies, the East Division, and give a reminder to watch the new Sandbagger on Wednesday at 6pm EST.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
